chatbot_welcome:
Hello! I'm the Friender chatbot.
How can I help you?
chatbot_response_greeting: Hello! I'm the Friender chatbot. How can I help you?
chatbot_response_service: Friender is an educational platform with AI friends. We offer various services including Dream Path, Inno Works, and AI Storybook. Please check our main page for more details!
chatbot_response_price: For detailed information about pricing and plans, please contact us through the contact page and we'll provide you with detailed information.
chatbot_response_contact: If you have any inquiries, please contact us through the contact page or email us at sunwockd{'@'}naver.com.
chatbot_response_help: You need help! Feel free to ask about service introduction, pricing, technical support, or anything else. We'll do our best to help you.
chatbot_response_default: I'm sorry. For more accurate answers, please contact us through the contact page, or ask another question and I'll help you.
